channel.title: Need help with shops
channel.description: don't say i need to search cz i did. how do you find the npc id of armour salemen and how do i change what he sells cz he sells d platebody and the arms are glitched and i was typing in random platebody i found in item.java and i found d platebody with gold arms to fix the glitch. i wanna add that to this armour salemans shops. how do i do it? any1 help me please!?
